column4: why would firefox and all other browsers start displaying websites improperly? it almost looks as if it's a CSS issue, ie: there is no page styles
no matter what i've tried reinstalling, uninstalling, can not fix this issue without reformating.
as a test try making a new user. see if it affects them? (faster then reinstalling)
That is a good idea. I will have to try once I get back home.
